source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_SEQ_00<tab>F'lhaminn has made her peace and is ready to reunite with her adopted daughter.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_SEQ_00<tab>ワインポートのフ・ラミンは、ミンフィリアに会いに行きたいようだ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_SEQ_01<tab>After five long years, the time has come for F'lhaminn to reunite with her daughter Minfilia. You resolve to accompany the songstress to Vesper Bay and watch over what should prove to be an emotional reunion.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_SEQ_01<tab>フ・ラミンと話した。ベスパーベイの砂の家にいる「ミンフィリア」と話そう。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_SEQ_02<tab>Upon seeing Alphinaud escort F'lhaminn into the solar, Minfilia rushes forward to embrace her long-lost mother, overjoyed to learn that reports of her death were indeed exaggerated. During their tearful reunion, Minfilia explains that her father was once a member of the Ala Mhigan Resistance, and that following his death in a tragic accident, F'lhaminn raised her as her own. After praising Minfilia for her victories over the Empire, F'lhaminn states that the Scions must leave Ul'dah behind if they are to continue their work. Agreeing at last to Alphinaud's proposal, a reinvigorated Minfilia declares that the order will quit Vesper Bay and establish a new headquarters in Revenant's Toll.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_SEQ_02<tab>ミンフィリアと話すことができた。育ての親であるフ・ラミンと再会することができたミンフィリアは、ついに砂の家を移転させる決心を固めたようだ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_TODO_00<tab>Report to Minfilia at the Waking Sands.
target: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_TODO_00<tab>砂の家のミンフィリアと話す

source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_SYSTEM_100_000受注するには、進行中のメインクエストを破棄する必要があります。
メインコマンドの「コンテンツ情報」から、
「ジャーナル」を選び、破棄してください。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_ALPHINAUD_100_001<tab>Despite her years of nomadism, it would seem Lady F'lhaminn has kept a close eye on the affairs of our order. Surprisingly close, in fact. Suffice to say, she is nothing if not resourceful.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_ALPHINAUD_100_001フ・ラミンさんは、
ミンフィリアや「暁」の活躍を知っていたよ。
きっと各地を転々としつつ、情報を集めていたのだろう。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_ALPHINAUD_100_002<tab>One does not develop such skills without effort─or without reason.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_ALPHINAUD_100_002遠く離れていても、子を想う……。
母とは、偉大なものだな。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_FLHAMINN_000_000<tab>You say my daughter awaits us in Vesper Bay, yes?
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_FLHAMINN_000_000確か、ミンフィリアがいるのは、
ベスパーベイにある「暁」の本部という話よね？

source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_FLHAMINN_000_001<tab>I have kept her waiting long enough. Let us be off on the next ferry. I can finish fashioning the perfume along the way.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_FLHAMINN_000_001それなら材料も手に入ったことだし、
香水作りは、定期船の船上でするとして……
さっそく、出発しましょうか。

source: TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_ALPHINAUD_000_002<tab>Understood. Come with me─it would be my pleasure to escort you to the Waking Sands.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSE104_03875_ALPHINAUD_000_002わかりました。
それでは私が「砂の家」へとご案内いたしましょう。
